items.title: 苹果停止签署 iOS 18.6.2，iOS 26 降级现已不可能 (原标题: Apple Stops Signing iOS 18.6.2, iOS 26 Downgrades Now Impossible)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### 苹果停止签署 iOS 18.6.2，阻止从 iOS 26 降级

**发布日期：** 2025年9月22日

**主要内容：**

*   **停止签署旧版本：** 苹果已于2025年9月22日停止签署 iOS 18.6.2 版本。
*   **降级受阻：** 这意味着，如果用户已将设备升级到一周前发布的 iOS 26，将无法再降级回 iOS 18.6.2 或更早的 iOS 18 版本。
*   **“签署”机制解释：**
    *   软件“签署”是苹果在 iPhone 下载新版 iOS 时执行的服务器端验证检查。
    *   只有通过此验证检查的更新才能被安装。
    *   停止签署旧版本软件的目的是防止苹果用户安装过时、安全性较低的 iOS 版本。
*   **用户选择与限制：**
    *   苹果并未强制用户安装 iOS 26，用户可以选择继续使用 iOS 18。
    *   然而，一旦设备升级到 iOS 26，便无法再降级回旧版本。
*   **其他设备影响：** 苹果也已停止签署 iPadOS 18.6.2 和 tvOS 18.6，这意味着 iPad 同样没有降级选项。

![iOS 26 on iPhone Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ULciynKusakzMLK0UZMhMEVls6A=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26-on-iPhone-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已停止签署 iOS 18.6.2，这意味着已升级至 iOS 26 的用户将无法再降级到 iOS 18。此举旨在防止用户安装过时、安全性较低的 iOS 版本。虽然用户可以选择不升级到 iOS 26，但一旦升级，便无法回退。iPadOS 18.6.2 和 tvOS 18.6 也已停止签署，同样阻止了降级。
items.translated_title: 苹果停止签署 iOS 18.6.2，iOS 26 降级现已不可能
items.content:
Apple has stopped signing iOS 18.6.2, which means that if you've upgraded to iOS 26, you're no longer able to downgrade to a version of iOS 18. Apple released iOS 26 a week ago.


When software is "signed," it means that it has passed a server-side verification check that Apple performs when a new version of iOS is downloaded on an iPhone. An update can't be installed unless it passes the verification check.

Unsigning software prevents Apple customers from installing outdated, less secure versions of iOS.

Apple isn't forcing users to install ‌iOS 26‌, and there is an option to continue using iOS 18, but once a device has been upgraded to ‌iOS 26‌, there's no going back.

Apple has also stopped signing iPadOS 18.6.2 and tvOS 18.6, so there's also no downgrade option available for iPads.
This article, "Apple Stops Signing iOS 18.6.2, iOS 26 Downgrades Now Impossible" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26.1 Beta 1 中的所有新功能 (原标题: Everything New in iOS 26.1 Beta 1)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
Apple 在发布 iOS 26 一周后，于2025年9月22日发布了 iOS 26.1 的第一个测试版。此次更新主要为 Apple Intelligence 增加了新语言支持，并带来了一些其他值得关注的功能改进。

### 主要更新内容：

*   **Apple Intelligence 新增语言**
    *   Apple Intelligence 现已支持丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、中文（繁体）和越南语。
    ![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

*   **AirPods 实时翻译语言扩展**
    *   AirPods 实时翻译在 iOS 26.1 中增加了对日语、韩语、意大利语和中文（普通话繁体和简体）的支持。

*   **电话应用**
    *   电话拨号键盘的数字现在采用“液态玻璃”（Liquid Glass）效果。
    ![ios 26 1 phone app keypad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zopNTL2fSpKZ42-mA_uLWCRQasA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-phone-app-keypad.jpg?lossy)

*   **Apple Music**
    *   用户现在可以在 Apple Music 播放器中通过滑动歌曲标题区域来切换歌曲（向前或向后）。
    ![ios 26 1 apple music swipe](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iWj6xpADhwmHwh1o1i3bcGEyAuU=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-apple-music-swipe.jpg?lossy)

*   **照片应用**
    *   照片应用中用于视频拖动的滑动条已更新。
    ![ios 26 1 photos app video](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6217JpyD8uGay5Yk8G91FI0Nsn4=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-photos-app-video.jpg?lossy)
    *   导航栏也略微增加了磨砂效果，使其在浅色背景下更易于查看。
    ![ios 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/usz4vpVeQA1UFBS85Xc6GKG5uOQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26.1-photos-buttons.jpg?lossy)

*   **日历应用**
    *   在日历应用中，部分视图现在以全彩背景显示来自不同日历的事件。
    ![ios 26 1 calendar colors](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2_1auh4CY1LrFDzToQs8OQWAXDU=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-calendar-colors.jpg?lossy)

*   **Safari 浏览器**
    *   Safari 浏览器底部的标签栏（Tab Bar）变得更宽，边缘的填充更少。
    ![ios 26 1 safari bar](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CvyRnunBa06d5z3hODkIFLpuxCk=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-safari-bar.jpg?lossy)

*   **后台安全改进**
    *   “快速安全更新”（Rapid Security Updates）的名称似乎已更改为“后台安全改进”（Background Security Improvement）。根据 iOS 26.1 代码中的描述，此功能通过在 iOS 软件更新发布前安装安全改进和系统文件来提升 iPhone 的安全性。在极少数兼容性问题的情况下，这些交付可能会暂时移除，并在后续的软件更新中得到改进。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26.1 Beta 1 主要更新包括：为Apple Intelligence新增丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语等语言。AirPods实时翻译扩展支持日语、韩语、意大利语及中文（普通话繁体和简体）。其他改进包括：电话应用键盘采用“液态玻璃”效果；Apple Music支持滑动切歌；照片应用视频滑动条和导航栏优化；日历应用事件显示全彩背景；Safari底部标签栏加宽。此外，“快速安全更新”更名为“后台安全改进”。
items.translated_title: iOS 26.1 Beta 1 中的所有新功能
items.content:
Apple released the first beta of iOS 26.1 today, just a week after launching iOS 26. iOS 26.1 mainly adds new languages to Apple Intelligence, but there are a few other features that are worth knowing about.


New Apple Intelligence Languages


‌Apple Intelligence‌ is now available in Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese (Portugal), Swedish, Turkish, Chinese (Traditional), and Vietnamese.

AirPods Live Translation Languages


AirPods Live Translation works with additional languages in iOS 26.1, including Japanese, Korean, Italian, and Chinese (both Mandarin Traditional and Simplified).

Phone


The Phone keypad now uses Liquid Glass for the numbers.


Apple Music


You can swipe on the music player in Apple Music to switch songs. Just slide a finger over where the song title is listed, and it'll go to the next song or back to the previous song.


Photos


The slider for scrubbing through videos in the Photos app has been updated.



The navigation bar also has a slightly more frosted look that makes it easier to see on light backgrounds.


Calendar


In the Calendar app, some of the views now show events from different calendars with a full color background.

‌iOS 26‌ on left, iOS 26.1 on right


Safari


The Tab Bar (Bottom) in Safari is wider with less padding around the edges.


Background Security Improvement


Apple appears to have changed the name of Rapid Security Updates to Background Security Improvement, which is mentioned in the iOS 26.1 code.

"Background Security Improvement improves the security of your iPhone by installing security improvements and system files before they are available in iOS Software Updates. In rare instances of compatibility issues, these deliveries may be temporarily removed and then improved in a feature software update."

More Features


Know of something new in iOS 26.1 that we missed? Let us know in the comments below.
This article, "Everything New in iOS 26.1 Beta 1" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26.1 新增 Apple 智能语言并扩展 AirPods 实时翻译功能 (原标题: iOS 26.1 Adds New Apple Intelligence Languages and Expands AirPods Live Translation)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26.1 更新：Apple 智能语言和 AirPods 实时翻译功能扩展

Apple 于2025年9月22日发布了 iOS 26.1 更新，该版本主要扩展了 Apple 智能（Apple Intelligence）和 AirPods 实时翻译功能的语言支持。

## Apple 智能语言支持扩展

*   **新增语言：** iOS 26.1 为 Apple 智能新增了以下语言支持：
    *   丹麦语 (Danish)
    *   荷兰语 (Dutch)
    *   挪威语 (Norwegian)
    *   葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）(Portuguese (Portugal))
    *   瑞典语 (Swedish)
    *   土耳其语 (Turkish)
    *   繁体中文 (Chinese (Traditional))
    *   越南语 (Vietnamese)
*   **背景：** Apple 去年曾宣布计划扩展 Apple 智能的语言支持，此次更新兑现了这一承诺。
*   **当前支持语言列表：** Apple 智能现已支持以下语言：
    *   英语（美国、澳大利亚、加拿大、新西兰、英国、南非、印度、新加坡）
    *   简体中文
    *   法语
    *   日语
    *   西班牙语
    *   德语
    *   意大利语
    *   韩语
    *   葡萄牙语（巴西）
    *   以及 iOS 26.1 新增的丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语。

## AirPods 实时翻译功能扩展

*   iOS 26.1 更新还为 AirPods 实时翻译功能增加了更多语言支持，包括：
    *   日语
    *   韩语
    *   意大利语
    *   中文（包括普通话繁体和简体）

## 可用性

*   iOS 26.1 目前已面向开发者提供，预计将在未来几周内向公众测试版用户推出。

![Apple Intelligence General Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bXt7Maqcc83bP9Cz6gmYvy6hBtE=/400x0/article-new/2024/09/Apple-Intelligence-General-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26.1 更新于2025年9月22日发布，显著扩展了 Apple 智能和 AirPods 实时翻译功能的语言支持。Apple 智能新增了丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语等语言。同时，AirPods 实时翻译功能也增加了日语、韩语、意大利语以及中文（繁体和简体）的支持。该版本目前已向开发者提供，公测版预计将在未来几周内推出。

items.title: 苹果发布 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1 和 macOS Tahoe 26.1 的首个测试版 (原标题: Apple Seeds First Betas of iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, and macOS Tahoe 26.1)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果发布 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1 等系统首个测试版

**发布概览**

*   **发布日期**：2025年9月22日
*   **发布对象**：开发者
*   **更新系统**：苹果向开发者提供了 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1、tvOS 26.1、watchOS 26.1 和 visionOS 26.1 的首个测试版，用于测试目的。
*   **背景**：这些是上周发布的 iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26、watchOS、tvOS 和 visionOS 版本的首次更新。

**下载与可用性**

*   **下载方式**：兼容设备的用户可以通过“设置”应用，进入“通用”>“软件更新”来下载新的测试版。
*   **当前限制**：目前，这些测试版仅限于开发者使用。
*   **未来展望**：苹果未来可能会向公众测试版用户发布部分更新。

**iOS 26.1 Beta 1 新增功能**

虽然具体更新内容尚未完全公布，但已知或预期包含以下特性：

*   **Apple Intelligence 语言支持扩展**：
    *   Apple Intelligence 现已支持丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语。
*   **AirPods 实时翻译功能扩展**。
*   **其他可能功能**：可能包含 iOS 26 初始版本中未包含的功能，例如 Wallet 对护照的支持。

**相关图片**

![iOS 26.1 特性](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

**其他热门新闻简报**

文章还提及了其他一些热门新闻，包括：

*   **iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone Air 颜色易刮擦**：据报道，部分深色款 iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max（深蓝色）和 iPhone Air（深空黑）模型更容易出现刮痕和磨损。
*   **可折叠 iPhone 传闻**：据称，苹果明年的可折叠 iPhone 将采用超薄设计，形似“两部钛金属 iPhone Airs 并排”。
*   **下一代 Apple TV 预期功能**：预计今年晚些时候发布，可能搭载 N1 芯片并支持 Wi-Fi 7。
*   **iPhone 17 系列 Wi-Fi 间歇性问题**：部分 iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max 和 iPhone Air 用户报告遇到间歇性 Wi-Fi 连接中断问题。
*   **iOS 26.0.1 即将发布**：预计将修复 iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 的摄像头相关错误。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已向开发者发布 iOS 26.1、iPadOS 26.1、macOS Tahoe 26.1 等多个操作系统的首个测试版，作为上周发布的 iOS 26 系列的首次更新。iOS 26.1 的主要亮点是为 Apple Intelligence 增加了丹麦语、繁体中文等多种新语言支持，并扩展了 AirPods 实时翻译功能。此外，文章还提及了 iPhone 17 Pro/Air 易刮擦、部分 iPhone 17 用户遇到 Wi-Fi 问题、iOS 26.0.1 即将发布以修复摄像头错误，以及关于可折叠 iPhone 和下一代 Apple TV 的传闻。

Apple today provided developers with the first betas of upcoming iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS Tahoe 26.1, tvOS 26.1, watchOS 26.1, and visionOS 26.1 updates for testing purposes. The new betas are the first updates to the iOS, iPadOS, macOS 26, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS releases that came out last week.


The new betas can be downloaded from the Settings app on a compatible device by going to General > Software Update.

We don't yet know what's included in the beta software, but there are a couple of features that didn't make it into the launch version of iOS 26, like Wallet support for passports. We'll share details when we learn what's new.

The iOS 26.1, iPadOS 26.1, macOS Tahoe 26.1, tvOS 26.1, watchOS 26.1, and visionOS 26.1, betas are limited to developers right now, but Apple will likely release some of the updates to public beta testers in the future.

# 下一代Apple TV：新功能与发布展望

根据最新传闻，下一代Apple TV预计将于今年晚些时候发布，可能带来一系列显著的新功能和改进。

## 发布时间

据彭博社的Mark Gurman透露，下一代Apple TV预计将在“今年年底”发布。最有可能的发布时间是10月或11月，而12月的可能性较低。回顾历史，Apple TV的发布通常集中在秋季：

*   **Apple TV 4K (第三代):** 2022年10月
*   **Apple TV 4K (第二代):** 2021年4月
*   **Apple TV 4K (第一代):** 2017年9月
*   **Apple TV HD:** 2015年9月

## 主要预期功能

### 1. N1芯片与Wi-Fi 7

![apple tv 4k new orange](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JJTJQpj8-ZhupdfM5XBo3MiqSnU=/400x0/article-new/2024/06/apple-tv-4k-new-orange.jpg?lossy)

*   **芯片升级**: 彭博社的Mark Gurman曾表示，下一代Apple TV将配备苹果自研的Wi-Fi和蓝牙组合芯片，这很可能是已在iPhone 17系列和iPhone Air中首次亮相的N1芯片。
*   **Wi-Fi 7支持**: N1芯片支持Wi-Fi 7，这将是当前Apple TV Wi-Fi 6支持的重大升级。Wi-Fi 7通过同时在2.4GHz、5GHz和6GHz频段传输数据，显著增加了带宽，理论速度比Wi-Fi 6快四倍。然而，实际速度通常受限于互联网服务提供商和其他因素。
*   **蓝牙6支持**: 在最新的iPhone中，N1芯片还支持蓝牙6，相比当前Apple TV的蓝牙5，它能提供更低的延迟和其他优势。

![apple n1 chip](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0EySOQWSGb1dDH5IWsR8eyphvVA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/apple-n1-chip.jpg?lossy)

### 2. A17 Pro芯片

*   **性能提升**: 据MacRumors撰稿人Aaron Perris称，下一代Apple TV将搭载A17 Pro芯片，以提供更快的性能。
*   **Apple Intelligence支持**: 性能提升可能为tvOS上的Apple Intelligence提供支持。例如，Gurman提到新款Apple TV将支持明年由Apple Intelligence驱动的Siri改版。
*   **其他设备**: 搭载A17 Pro芯片的设备包括iPhone 15 Pro、iPhone 15 Pro Max和iPad mini 7，这些设备均支持Apple Intelligence。
*   **内存增加**: 预计A17 Pro芯片还将使Apple TV的RAM增加到8GB。

![A17 Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TiNF-IAyyiUuhyRPiz__6GZRt3k=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/A17-Pro.jpg?lossy)

## 其他传闻

### 1. FaceTime摄像头和手势控制

*   **FaceTime应用**: tvOS 17已经为Apple TV添加了FaceTime应用，允许用户通过连接的iPhone或iPad的后置摄像头进行视频通话。
*   **内置摄像头可能性**: Gurman在2024年4月曾表示，苹果“讨论过”推出一款内置摄像头以支持FaceTime和基于手势控制的Apple TV。目前尚不清楚苹果是否会为下一代型号推进这一计划。
*   **tvOS 26的FaceTime增强**: tvOS 26在多个方面增强了FaceTime体验，这与内置摄像头的Apple TV相得益彰：
    *   **个性化体验**: 用户可在Apple TV上享受与iOS一致的个性化FaceTime体验。
    *   **联系人海报**: 在Apple TV上发起FaceTime通话时，会显示联系人定制的照片和姓名，使其更具个性化。
    *   **实时字幕**: 实时字幕功能扩展到法语、德语、日语、韩语、普通话和西班牙语，Apple TV可利用设备智能显示FaceTime对话的实时字幕。
    *   **通话通知**: FaceTime音频和电话通知将显示在活动配置文件屏幕上，用户可以通过连接的HomePod扬声器或iPhone接听。

![tvos 17 facetime](https://images.macrumors.com/t/P7DxHknCD1FbQs0oz_kYPBDp4Yk=/400x0/article-new/2013/12/tvos-17-facetime.jpg?lossy)

### 2. 更低价格

*   **价格预测**: 在当前Apple TV于2022年10月发布当天，苹果供应链分析师郭明錤预测下一代Apple TV将“更实惠”。他认为低于100美元的价格将是Apple TV的“最佳点”，但未明确苹果是否能实现这一价格。
*   **历史先例**: 2010年和2012年版本的Apple TV在美国上市时定价均为99美元，2012年型号后来降至69美元，因此低于100美元的Apple TV有先例。
*   **市场竞争**: 亚马逊和Roku等公司提供价格低廉的流媒体棒，促销价甚至低至19.99美元。
*   **当前价格**: 目前，美国市场的Apple TV 64GB版本起售价为129美元，带以太网端口的128GB版本售价为149美元。

items.translated_title: 下一代Apple TV预计今年发布，将带来这些新功能
items.content:
The next Apple TV is expected to be released later this year, and a handful of new features and changes have been rumored for the device.


Below, we recap what to expect from the next Apple TV, according to rumors.

Likely Features


N1 Chip With Wi-Fi 7


Last year, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said the next Apple TV would be equipped with Apple's own combined Wi-Fi and Bluetooth chip, which is likely the since-announced N1 chip that debuted in the iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air. That chip supports Wi-Fi 7, which would be an upgrade over the current Apple TV's Wi-Fi 6 support.


Wi-Fi 7 has increased bandwidth, in part because it allows for data transmission over the 2.4GHz, 5GHz, and 6GHz bands simultaneously, with a supported device and router. Wi-Fi 7 is theoretically up to 4× faster than Wi-Fi 6, but real-world speeds are typically bottlenecked by internet service providers and other factors.

In the latest iPhones, the N1 chip also supports Bluetooth 6, which would offer lower latency and other benefits compared to the current Apple TV's Bluetooth 5.

A17 Pro Chip


The current Apple TV is powered by the A15 Bionic chip, which debuted in all iPhone 13 and iPhone 13 Pro models in 2022.

According to MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris, the next Apple TV will be equipped with the A17 Pro chip, for faster performance and potentially even Apple Intelligence support on tvOS. For example, Gurman said the new Apple TV will support next year's revamped version of Siri, powered by Apple Intelligence.


Other devices with the A17 Pro chip include the iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max, and the iPad mini 7, and all of those devices support Apple Intelligence.

With the A17 Pro chip, the Apple TV should get an increased 8GB of RAM.

Other Rumors


FaceTime Camera and Gesture Controls?


tvOS 17 added a FaceTime app to the Apple TV, allowing for video calls with the rear camera on a connected iPhone or iPad. If the Apple TV gained a built-in camera, users would no longer need to rely on an external device for video calls on the TV.

In April 2024, Gurman said Apple had "discussed" offering an Apple TV with a built-in camera for FaceTime and gesture-based controls, but it is unclear if Apple is moving forward with that plan for the next model in particular. He did not elaborate on the gesture aspect, but it sounds like the Apple TV would recognize various hand movements.


Apple says tvOS 26 enhances FaceTime in several ways — fitting for an Apple TV with a camera:
With tvOS 26, users can enjoy a more personalized FaceTime experience that's consistent with iOS. Contact Posters on Apple TV make it easier and more personal by displaying a contact's customized photo and name when starting a FaceTime call on Apple TV. Live Captions expand to include French, German, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, and Spanish, enabling Apple TV to use on-device intelligence to display Live Captions for FaceTime conversations, so users can follow what's being said in even more languages. Additionally, FaceTime audio and phone call notifications will appear onscreen for the active profile, allowing users to answer on connected HomePod speakers or their iPhone, and ensuring that communication with loved ones remains at the forefront.

Lower Price?


On the same day as the current Apple TV was announced in October 2022, Apple supply chain analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said that he expected the next Apple TV to be "more affordable." He said that a sub-$100 price would be the "sweet spot" for the Apple TV, but he did not say if Apple will actually achieve that price point.

Both the 2010 and 2012 versions of the Apple TV were priced at $99 in the U.S. at launch, and Apple eventually lowered the price of the 2012 model to $69, so there is precedent for a sub-$100 Apple TV. Other companies like Amazon and Roku offer low-priced streaming sticks, with sale prices going as low as $19.99.

In the U.S., the current Apple TV starts at $129 with 64GB of storage, and a 128GB model with an Ethernet port for wired internet is priced at $149.

Timing


The next Apple TV will be released "toward the end of the year," according to Gurman. At this point, it is likely the device will be announced in October, but November is also a possibility. December is less likely, historically.

Here is when the previous four Apple TV models were announced:
  • Apple TV 4K (3rd generation): October 2022

  • Apple TV 4K (2nd generation): April 2021

  • Apple TV 4K (1st generation): September 2017

  • Apple TV HD: September 2015
